description:
An icon known for its outstanding versatility, the Gamma LT continues to evolve. Steeped in climbing DNA, it’s also a go-to for hikers, backpackers – anyone requiring durability, comfort, wind protection, and the freedom of performance stretch. The hardwearing Fortius™ DW 2.0 softshell resists wind and water and provides light insulation. The waistband rides comfortably under a harness or hipbelt, the cuff closes with drawstring, and secure pockets include an easily accessible one at the thigh.

Updated with more comfortable low-profile waistbelt, redesigned pockets.
name: Arcteryx Gamma LT Pants, Tall - Mens
